import axios from 'axios' import React from 'react' export default function Register() { const handleSubmit=(event)=>{ const data={ password:event.target.password.value, isConfirmed:true, } axios.post('http://localhost:4242/register',data).then((res)=>{ console.log(res) } ) } const handleChange=(event)=>{ } return ( <>

Enter password for your account

) }
